title: Yama Nezumi Rocky Chuck
original_name: 山ねずみ ロッキーチャック
opening_song: "Midori no Hidamari (緑の陽だまり)" by Mitchi to Chataraz (ミッチーとチャタラーズ)
ending_song: "Rocky to Polly (ロッキーとポリー)" by Mitchi to Chataraz (ミッチーとチャタラーズ)
sinopse: Various stories about a group of animals that live together in a forest. The stories are adaptations from the many children's books written by Thornton W. Burgess.
